channel.title: ClashX ChangeLog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.description:
• Update clash core
  • Try fix enhanced mode start fail
  • Support update external resource in the menu bar
  • Fix basic highlight issue in macOS11
Sun, 06 Sep 2020 05:21:14 GMTVersion 1.30.1.3 (1.30.1.3)
  • Update core & dashboard
Sat, 01 Aug 2020 04:04:37 GMTVersion 1.30.1.2 (1.30.1.2)
  • Support Process Name rule PROCESS-NAME,curl,PROXY
  • Support shadowsocksR, go to clash core configuration wiki for details
Wed, 22 Jul 2020 16:06:55 GMTVersion 1.30.1.1 (1.30.1.1)
  • Support Process Name rule. Usage:
 - PROCESS-NAME,curl,PROXY
Wed, 22 Jul 2020 14:48:10 GMTVersion 1.30.0.2 (1.30.0.2)
  • 更新图标
  • 更新 Clash Core 至 v1.0

注意: 由于ClashCore 1.0的发布 本版本包括不向前兼容的更新。如果您的配置文件尚未兼容新的配置文件格式，请谨慎更新。

查看详细内容：https://github.com/Dreamacro/clash/wiki/breaking-changes-in-1.0.0

主要包括：

  • Proxy, Proxy Gro up and Rule 不在被支持，请更新成proxies, proxy-groups and rules.
  • rule-provider 更新为 rule-providers .
  • 对于ss节点, obfs, obfs-host 字段被废弃，请使用plugin 和 plugin-opts 替代
  • FINAL 关键字被废弃，请使用 MATCH 替代
  • SOURCE-IP-CIDR 关键字被废弃，请使用 SRC-IP-CIDR 替代
  • Update the app icon
  • Update clash core to v1.0

Notice: This version of ClashX contains break changes due to clash core 1.0 released. Please check your config before update.

  • Get the detail changes in https://github.com/Dreamacro/clash/wiki/breaking-changes-in-1.0.0
Fri, 10 Jul 2020 15:12:49 GMT
